data.comment: The match has started at Nissan Stadium.
In Yokohama, Eitaro Matsuda of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 1, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Wada breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sapporo.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Junior Santos.
In the minute 8, Great play from Ryo Takano to set up the goal.
Junpei Iida signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Yokohama Marinos's Ryo Takano is whistled for offside at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Yokohama.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 17, Daizen Maeda (Yokohama Marinos) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 19, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 21, Junpei Iida awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Ken Matsubara for Yokohama Marinos drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sapporo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
In the minute 31, Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Junior Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Sapporo's Lucas Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
In the minute 32, Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 34, Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Junpei Iida awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Sapporo are caught offside.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Takahiro Ogihara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Junpei Iida signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Sapporo's area.
In the minute 40, Junior Santos puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Takuya Wada.
Sapporo are coming forward and Kazuki Fukai gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
At Nissan Stadium, Sapporo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 44, Sapporo needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Nissan Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 46, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 46, Jun Amano is replacing Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's first substitution at Nissan Stadium with Yoshihiro Nakano replacing Akito Fukumori.
Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a second substitution, with Douglas replacing Kazuki Fukai.
In the minute 46, Sapporo make their third substitution with Anderson Lopes replacing Hiroki Miyazawa.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 48, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
Junpei Iida signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Douglas of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Junpei Iida awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Shinnosuke Hatanaka.
Eitaro Matsuda with an assist there.
In the minute 55, Sapporo's Douglas gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Teruhito Nakagawa is on a sub for Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Chanathip Songkrasin for the away team is judged to be offside.
Junpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Daizen Maeda with Erik. This is the third substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Teruhito Nakagawa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sapporo apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Lucas Fernandes. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 60, Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Yokohama Marinos defence as Anderson Lopes fires in a strike for Sapporo.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 62, Junpei Iida awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Sapporo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 65, Eitaro Matsuda (Yokohama Marinos) has received a yellow card from Junpei Iida.
In the minute 66, Teruhito Nakagawa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
Junpei Iida signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Sapporo's area.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 68, Michael Petrovic is making the team's fourth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Takuro Kaneko replacing Chanathip Songkrasin.
Sapporo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Yokohama Marinos.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a fourth substitution, with Theerathon Bunmathan replacing Eitaro Matsuda.
In the minute 72, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Nissan Stadium.
Junpei Iida signals a Sapporo throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Anderson Lopes (Sapporo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yokohama Marinos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Takuya Wada with Kota Watanabe. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
The away team replace Yoshiaki Komai with Kim Min-Tae.
In Yokohama, Yokohama Marinos push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Junpei Iida.
Sapporo are coming forward and Lucas Fernandes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Junpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Great finish from Teruhito Nakagawa to give Yokohama Marinos a 4-0 lead.
Erik instrumental with a fine assist.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sapporo.
Junpei Iida signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Takuro Kaneko (Sapporo) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos push upfield but Junpei Iida quickly pulls them for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 4-1.
Goal! Anderson Lopes pulls one back for Sapporo to make it 4-1.
Douglas instrumental with a fine assist.
